entry.title: WINTER STORM WARNING , White River
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 11:23 AM EST Saturday 24 December 2022

entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Snow, -14.1°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Wawa Airport 11:22 AM EST Saturday 24 December 2022

Visibility: 4.8 km
Humidity: 71 %

Dewpoint: -18.3°C

entry.title: Saturday: Periods of snow. High minus 12.
entry.summary: Periods of snow and local blowing snow. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50. High minus 12. Wind chill minus 26 this morning and minus 21 this afternoon. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Saturday 24 December 2022

entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 18. POP 60%
entry.summary: Periods of light snow ending late this evening then cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40. Low minus 18. Wind chill minus 21 this evening and minus 28 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Saturday 24 December 2022

entry.title: Sunday: Chance of flurries. High minus 12. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 60 percent chance of flurries early in the morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 12. Wind chill minus 27 in the morning and minus 19 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Saturday 24 December 2022
